oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Some Notes on Leading Discussions
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Notes for local UPWA-CIO instructors on how to lead discussions with their local union groups. This is a great example of the practical skills taught at Highlander's labor workshops.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Labor unions--Organizing--United States; Highlander Folk School (Monteagle, Tenn.); Congress of Industrial Organizations (U.S.); United Public Workers of America; Labor unions--Officials and employees; Labor leaders; Meetings; Labor union meetings
